name: Language Place
description:
This game is a 3D scene in which you look (horizontally) around to room by using your phone's gyroscope. The aim is to test your vocabulary knowledge or to learn new words by finding the correct object from the room and clicking on it. Currently the game is in English and the tested language is Finnish.

The game was made for a Centria GameLab course (which Jokatti attends). This is the first version of the game with the basic functionality in place and with 1 level.

Concept & Design: Jokatti

Code: Jokatti & m2tias

3D models: m2tias
